name: Parsnip-Potato-and-Roasted-Garlic Puree
recipeIngredient: 4 large parsnips, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch thick rounds
2 large baking potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
2 teaspoons salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the parsnips in a large saucepan and cover with water. Place over medium-high heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the potatoes and cook until parsnips and potatoes are soft, about 15 minutes. Drain well and pass the vegetables through a ricer into a medium-size bowl.
Stir the roasted garlic and the milk into the puree until well combined. Add the salt and pepper to taste. Divide among 4 plates and serve immediately.
